feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 a.m. NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 3:30 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: E 22 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6 except 9 north of Cape Ray.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High 6 except 9 north of Cape Ray. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area. High plus 2. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 17 April 2023
